example.eg: There are a number of objects lying on the floor.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 物体, 东西, 实物

example.eg: Henry's object is to become CEO by the time he's thirty-five.
example.egtrans: 亨利的目标是在35岁时成为公司执行总裁。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 目标, 目的, 宗旨

example.eg: Transitive verbs take an object.
example.egtrans: 及物动词后面可以跟宾语。

example.eg: You want to build a road through the nature reserve? Well, I object!
example.egtrans: 你们想穿过这片自然保护区修路？好吧，我反对！

example.eg: Ann objected to Ben's participation in the project.
example.egtrans: 安不同意本参加这个项目。

example.eg: Helen objects to the plan for a new road.
example.egtrans: 海伦反对修新路的计划。

example.eg: The worker objected to having to work late since he wouldn't get paid for the extra hours.
example.egtrans: 工人没有加班工资，所以不同意加班加点工作。

example.eg: Peter and Mary objected that John had cheated.
example.egtrans: 彼得和玛丽否认约翰有出轨行为。

example.eg: The object of this discussion is Alan's performance at school this year.
David's dog is the object of his affections.
The direct object comes immediately after the verb.
"It" can be a direct object pronoun in English.

dsense.name: figure of fun, object of fun, object of ridicule

trans_examp.trans_cn: 可笑的人, 滑稽的人

dsense.name: found object
dsense.guideword: (art: [sth] not usually used for art) (艺术家用以创作的随手拾来的材料)

example.eg: Duchamp's urinal is a classic example of the artistic use of found objects.

dsense.name: indirect object
dsense.guideword: (noun or pronoun indirectly affected by a verb)

example.eg: In the sentence "I gave John the book", John is the indirect object of the verb.
"Her" is the indirect object pronoun in the sentence "I bought a plate for her."
His recent car accident provided him with an object lesson in the importance of safe driving.
"Him" can function as an object pronoun in English.

dsense.name: sex object
dsense.guideword: figurative ([sb] valued only for their attractiveness)

example.eg: I'm sick and tired of you treating me like some kind of sex object.
Roger claims that he once saw a UFO just above the horizon.  There have been sightings of UFOs for decades.
example.egtrans: 罗哲说，他有一次在地平线上方看到了不明飞行物。几十年来，一直有对不明飞行物的目击。

example.eg: Several residents of the small town claim to have seen an unidentified flying object last night.
